title: How to Quick Reply on Facebook Messenger

steps.title: Swipe down on the message notification pop-up at the top of your screen.
steps.content: Swipe down on the message notification pop-up at the top of your screen. When you're automatically logged into Messenger on your device and you receive a message, a pop-up notification will appear at the top of your screen. You will see the message and the sender's name in this pop-up. Swiping down on the pop-up notification will show you the full message, and give you options to Reply , Like , Mute , or View Message . [1] X Research source If your phone is locked, you will receive a notification on your Lock Screen, but you can't swipe down on the notification. If this is the case, swipe right on the notification on your Lock Screen to open Messenger and reply.

steps.title: Tap Reply from the pop-up menu.
steps.content: Tap Reply from the pop-up menu. Your keyboard will appear, and you will begin typing. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Type your response to the message you received.
steps.content: Type your response to the message you received.

steps.title: Tap Send.
steps.content: Tap Send . This is the blue button to the right of your message. Tapping on it will send your reply to your friend.

steps.title: Pull down the notifications menu.
steps.content: Pull down the notifications menu. When you're automatically logged into Messenger on your device and you receive a message, you will receive a message notification on your notifications menu. Swipe down from the top of your screen to see your latest notifications. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Swipe down on the message notification on your notifications menu.
steps.content: Swipe down on the message notification on your notifications menu. You will see an option to Reply . If your phone is locked, you will receive a notification on your Lock Screen. Swipe down on this notification to see the Reply option.

steps.title: Tap Reply.
steps.content: Tap Reply . Your keyboard will appear and you will begin typing your response. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Type your response to the message you received.
steps.content: Type your response to the message you received.

steps.title: Tap the Send button to the right of your message.
steps.content: Tap the Send button to the right of your message. This button will look like a tiny paper plane icon. Tapping on it will send your reply to your friend.
